document.masterDocTitle: Catalog of the mite (Acari) type specimens deposited at the “ Universidade Estadual Paulista (UNESP), Campus de São José do Rio Preto ”, São Paulo, Brazil (DZSJRP)

Paratype (10187):
1 ♀ , Costa Rica , Heredia , La Selva Biological Station , 10°26′N 84°1′W , ex. Myristicaceae sp.,
29.V.1994
, coll. The Arthropods of La Selva ( ALAS ) Project staff
.

65)
Daidalotarsonemus annonae Sousa, Lofego & Gondim Jr, 2014

Holotype (9226):
1 ♀ , Brazil , Pernambuco , Goiana, 7º38’16,08’’S , 34º57’9,41’’W , from
Annona coriacea Mart.
( Magnoliales : Annonaceae ),
15. VII .2005
, coll. J.M. Sousa.

Paratypes (9225):
same data as holotype with exceptions, 4 ♀ ; 2 ♀ (DZSJRP-9225), 7º38’17,63’’S 34º57’9,04’’W , from
Annona muricata
L. ( Magnoliales : Annonaceae ).

10.V.1994
, coll. The Arthropods of La Selva ( ALAS ) Project staff
.

Holotype (10199):
♀ , Brazil , Bahia , Ilhéus, 14°47’45»S ; 39°10’18»W , from
Theobroma cacao
L. ( Malvaceae ), 10.IX.2012 , colls. A.C. Lofego and J.M. Rezende.

Paratypes (10200–10208):
same data as holotype with exceptions, 4 ♀ , 2 ♂ ; 1 ♀ from
Annona muricata
L. ( Annonaceae ); 2 ♀ from
Spondias purpurea
L. ( Anacardiaceae ).

Holotype (10181):
1 ♀ , Brazil , Mato Grosso , Chapadão do Sul, from
Caryocar brasiliense Camb.
( Caryocaraceae ), I.2010 , colls. J.M. Rezende, A.C. Lofego and P.M. Paulon.

Paratypes (10182–10186):
same data as holotype with exception, 2 ♀ , from
Campomanesia pubescens
( DC .) Berg ( Myrtaceae ); following types with same data: Brazil , Goiás , Chapadão do Céu, 52°44’W 18°15’S , 02.II.2010 ; 1 ♀ , from Myrtaceae sp.; ♀ , from
Bauhinia
sp. ( Fabaceae ); 1 ♀ , from
Didymopanax vinosum Cham. & Schltdl.
( Araliaceae ).
